00043 static TH1* hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow;
00044 static TH1* hNOctalFADCBufferOverflowPercent;
00045 static int midas_events;

00060 
00063 INT MOctalFADCBufferOverflow_init()
00064 {
00065   // This histogram has the bank names labeled on the X-axis, and the midas
00066   // block number on the Y-axis.
00067   // This uses the TH1::kCanRebin mechanism to expand automatically to the
00068   // number of FADC banks.
00069   hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow = new TH1F(
00070     "hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow",
00071     "Total Number of Events in which the FADC Overflowed",
00072     4,128, 132);
00073   hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00074   hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00075   hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Total Number of Buffer Overflows");
00076 
00077   hNOctalFADCBufferOverflowPercent = new TH1F(
00078     "hNOctalFADCBufferOverflowPercent",
00079     "Fraction of MIDAS Events in which the FADC Overflowed",
00080     4,128, 132);
00081   hNOctalFADCBufferOverflowPercent->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00082   hNOctalFADCBufferOverflowPercent->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Fraction of events with Buffer Overflows");
00083 
00084   return SUCCESS;
00085 }
00086 
00090 INT module_bor(INT run_number)
00091 {
00092   midas_events = 1;
00093   
00094   return SUCCESS;
00095 }
00096 
00100 INT MOctalFADCBufferOverflow(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00101 {
00102   // Get the event number
00103 
00104   unsigned int* raw; // Points at the raw data
00105   int bankSize = bk_locate(pevent,"NBUF",&raw);
00106 
00107   if (bankSize != 0) {
00108     for (int i = 0; i < bankSize; i++) {
00109       hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow->Fill(*(raw+i));
00110       int bin = hNOctalFADCBufferOverflowPercent->FindBin(*(raw+i));
00111       hNOctalFADCBufferOverflowPercent->SetBinContent(bin, hNOctalFADCBufferOverflow->GetBinContent(bin) / midas_events);
00112     }
00113   }
00114   ++midas_events;
00115 
00116   return SUCCESS;
00117 }
